# attributed

**Instance Property**

The style used to create a locale-aware attributed string representation of an instance of person name components.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributed: PersonNameComponents.AttributedStyle { get }
```

## Modifying a Format Style

- **style**: Specifies the style of the formatted result.
- **PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style**: The type that represents the style of the formatted result.
- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the person name components.
